# Simple Test

This is a test markdown file for md-code-lite.

## main.go

```go
package main

import "fmt"

func main() {
    fmt.Println("Hello, World!")
}
```

## helper.js

```javascript
function add(a, b) {
    return a + b;
}

module.exports = { add };
```
